channel.title: Peach Schnapps Drinks
channel.description:
Okay so I am trying to find some good, AFFORDABLE mixed drinks using Peach Schnapps. I got a big bottle from a friend last night and I have like no earthly clue what is "cheap".
I would like to stay within a 12-13$ budget if possible :)
I prefer sweeter drinks but not required. Most of the stuff I am seeing online require several ingredients to get just the right taste.
edit: he also stated if I wanted I could get it swapped for his Apple Schnapps but I prefer Peach personally so if you know of a good/inexpensive one for apple list that one as well
